sentences.sContent: The dog was biting, growling, and wagging its tail.
sentences.sCn: 那条狗又咬又叫，摇着尾巴。

synos.tran: 咆哮；（雷电，炮等）[地物]轰鸣

remMethod.val: gr + owl(猫头鹰) → 猫头鹰叫 → 咆哮， 吼叫

words.tran: 鲈类；咆哮的人；短路线圈测试仪

trans.tranCn: 咆哮， 吼叫； 轰鸣
trans.tranOther: if an animal growls, it makes a long deep angry sound
